project.description: Activated by Automation Test Wait until all builds are ready and check if the last patch-set is a none codes changes and use the previous change-set

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
User="$artifactory_user:$artifactory_password" Artifactory="https://artifactory/api/storage/sbc-review/com/ac/sbc" DOWNLOAD=$(echo $Artifactory | sed 's|api/storage/||') CHANGES=`echo $REFSPEC | sed 's:refs/changes/../::'` REFTARGET=`echo $CHANGES | sed 's:/:-:g'`
echo =====Start Gerrit message ======= revisions=$(echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4,5 | sed 's:/:/revisions/:') curl -kns -u jenkins:${jenkins_pass} -X POST https://gerrit/a/changes/$revisions/review \ -d '{"message": "Automation Test compilation has started Clear AT score - '$BUILD_URL'", "notify": "NONE","labels": { "Automation-Test": "0"},"tag": "autogenerated:AT"}' \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' echo ======End gerrit message - clean AT vote before starting=======
set -x echo " ============checking if the build is running also in ippReview_SFB===========" sleep 90 #get all current running builds in ippReview_SFB builds_numbers=($(curl --insecure -X GET "https://jenkins/computer/api/json?depth=1&xpath=//url&wrapper=builds&pretty=true" | grep -w "https://jenkins/job/ippReview_SFB/[[:digit:]]*/" | awk -F'/' '{print $6}'))
#get all builds number that in queue queue_builds_numbers=($(curl --insecure -X GET "https://jenkins/queue/api/json?depth=1&xpath=//url&pretty=true" | grep nextBuildNumber | cut -d':' -f2 | cut -d',' -f1))
#add the two lists together (those who running and those who in queue) builds_numbers=("${builds_numbers[@]}" "${queue_builds_numbers[@]}")
#remove duplicates builds_numbers=($(echo ${builds_numbers[@]} | xargs -n1 | sort -u | xargs)) echo "${builds_numbers[@]}"
#iterate over all current running builds of ippReview_SFB and check if current change is running for build_number in ${builds_numbers[@]} do build_gerrit_refspec=$(curl --insecure -X GET "https://jenkins/job/ippReview_SFB/${build_number}/injectedEnvVars/export" | grep "GERRIT_REFSPEC" | cut -d'=' -f2) if [[ "${REFSPEC}" == "${build_gerrit_refspec}" ]] then current_change_build_number=${build_number} fi done
#check if job is running CURL_URL="https://jenkins/job/ippReview_SFB/${current_change_build_number}/api/json" curl --insecure -X GET ${CURL_URL} | grep result\":null > /dev/null GREP_RETURN_CODE=$? while [ $GREP_RETURN_CODE -eq 0 ] do echo "==========BUILD IS RUNNING ==========" sleep 240 # Grep will return 0 while the build is running curl --insecure -X GET ${CURL_URL} | grep result\":null > /dev/null GREP_RETURN_CODE=$? done echo "==========The build in ippReview_SFB is done =========="
# if file was compiled successfully but not yet deployed to artifactory, then wait 30 sec if ! curl -ks -u $User -X GET $Artifactory/VoiceAiConnector/$REFTARGET | grep -q .tgz; then echo tgz was not found, check if this patch-set will be compiled or no code was changed change=`echo $CHANGES | cut -d/ -f1` ps=`echo $CHANGES | cut -d/ -f2` ssh -p 29418 -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit query --patch-sets $change | grep 'kind:\|number:' | tail -n +2 | sed 's/ //g' > /tmp/$change.txt # $field Could be: number or kind # $kind could be: REWORK, TRIVIAL_REBASE, MERGE_FIRST_PARENT_UPDATE, NO_CODE_CHANGE or NO_CHANGE lastREWORK=1 while IFS=: read -r field value; do if [ "$field" == "number" ]; then checkPS=$value; else echo Check PS $checkPS: $value; if [[ ! "$value" =~ "NO_" ]]; then lastREWORK=$checkPS; fi fi done < /tmp/$change.txt
if [ "$ps" -eq "$lastREWORK" ]; then echo tgz file not ready, try again... exit 2 fi
CHANGES="$change/$lastREWORK" REFTARGET=`echo $CHANGES | sed 's:/:-:g'` if ! curl -ks -u $User -X GET $Artifactory/VoiceAiConnector/$REFTARGET | grep -q .tgz; then echo tgz for patch-set $lastREWORK file not ready, try again... exit 2 fi fi
echo CHANGES=${CHANGES} > VoiceAI.properties echo REFTARGET=${REFTARGET} >> VoiceAI.properties echo SBC_GERRIT_BRANCH=7.2.250 >> VoiceAI.properties
